ygData.subject: Re: Dissapointments with everquest.
ygData.msgSnippet: Lol I quit playing eq Ive completed the game so Im done one charcter is fine for me.  Im trying my hand at something else now. But id love tot rade tips and
ygData.messageBody:
Lol I quit playing eq Ive completed the game so Im done one charcter is fine
for me. Im trying my hand at something else now. But id love tot rade tips
and tricks of what I did. My original intentions was to be a wizard and I
played him to 15 and got bored of grouping Im not much with groups if people
I dont know. I really only group with friends, you tend not to die as
much...So I started a necro and played him to 24 and then leveld my wizard a
bit....I decided to play my necro luckily I was on a brand new server...bnd I
was high level on server....So I got all hunting spots to me and a select
few...nowadays we have to share...but it was great...I can give ya guys where
we hunted all the time if ya want.for some tips... level 1 through 5 theres a
secret spot in ak anon with lotsa newbie stuff where I hunted cause no one
else knows about it....5 to 8 I had to do jobolds and group....8 to 12 took
me a day to do all you had to do was hunt in valley solo fairly easy ...12 to
20 was in oasis like most people....20 to 24 was in lake rathe at aviak
gaurds...24 to 34 was in south karanas....and the next levels like 34 to 46
were spectres then we just item hunted and I gained my xp from that.
